title: Blazing Asses with Chris Green
description:
Handsome, classy, smart and cool: just a few ways most people describe Throwing Fits and the company we keep, which is exactly why we are dialing in former general merchandise manager of Totokaelo and Need Supply, and now full-time consultant at Stüssy, Chris Green. Chris is checking in with the boys to talk working with your hands, the TF live experience, his new gig, bridging gaps, the best stores in the world, Covid vs. the Fashion Industry, discovering your personal style and much more on this masculine yet elegant episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
